common.pageDescription: Credits retirement allows you to meet your emission reduction targets to become carbon-neutral.

info: Depends on amounts settled in your wallet. Settlement cycles happen daily at end of CET business day (GMT+1)
Are independent of trading activity and can be utilized at any time.
form.assetInfo: Only assets with a balance will be displayed in the list.
form.poolTokenInfoBold: When the pool token is selected,
form.poolTokenInfo: a credit to be retired will be randomly chosen from the pool during the retirement process.

selectedAssets.title: Summary
selectedAssets.placeholderText: Add credits on the retire list
selectedAssets.summaryDescriptionBold: You will receive the necessary documentation before audit season.
selectedAssets.summaryDescription: Contact support if you have any questions or need further assistance.

backdrops.retireCreditsDescription: Complete the following information to retire credits.
backdrops.infoPopoverContent: Green-E audits are often required for public companies making consumer or investor facing environmental claims.
backdrops.loadingHintBold: Retiring may take up to 1 min.
backdrops.loadingHint: Please wait until process is completed.
backdrops.successSubtitle: Your balances have been updated. There could be delays in displaying transactions in the history.
